topic: Mangoes are a _____ fruit here in Taiwan; most of them reach their peak of sweetness in July.(A)mature (B)usual (C)seasonal (D)particular
joke: What do you call a deer with no eyes?NO IDEA (no-eye-deer)!
moreAns: 芒果在台灣是一種___的水果;大部分的芒果在七月會達到甜度的巔峰。(A)成熟的 (B)正常的 (C)季節性的 (D)特定的

topic: Writing term papers and giving oral reports are typical course _____ for college students.(A)requirements (B)techniques (C)situations (D)principles
joke: Why was the math book sad?Because it had too many problems.
moreAns: 寫學期論文和上台發表報告對大學生而言都是典型的課程_____。(A)需求 (B)技巧 (C)情況 (D)原則

joke: 你知道雙腿屈膝之後會發生什麼事嗎?會蹲下喔!
